Seasonal Fruits and Veggies

May 04, 2016

Today's blog post is all about seasonal fruits and veggies. Buying produce while it's in season not only gets you tastier produce, but can save you money too! Below is a table of fruits and veggies and the seasons they are best in.

Spring Summer Fall Winter Year Long
Apricots Apricots Beets Beets Apples
Asparagus Bell Peppers Bell Peppers Brussel Sprouts Bananas
Broccoli Blackberries Brussel Sprouts Cabbage Carrots
Cabbage Blueberries Broccoli Grapefruit Celery

Created by: Lucy Fox
